mapper.insert: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.prefixConversion.impl.prefixConversionMapper.addPrefixConfig] - TOMMY */ INSERT INTO LOG0205M ( PREFIX_CONFIG_ID, PREFIX_STK_ID, PREFIX_CONV_STK_ID, USE_YN, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_ID ) VALUES ( LOG0205M_PREFIX_CONFIG_ID.NEXTVAL, #{prefixProdId}, #{prefixConvProdId}, #{useYn}, SYSDATE, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{updUserId} )
mapper.update: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.prefixConversion.impl.prefixConversionMapper.updatePrefixConfig] - TOMMY */ UPDATE LOG0205M SET PREFIX_STK_ID = #{prefixProdId}, PREFIX_CONV_STK_ID = #{prefixConvProdId}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} WHERE PREFIX_CONFIG_ID = #{prefixConfigId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.PREFIX_CONFIG_ID, A.PREFIX_STK_ID, B.STK_CODE AS PREFIX_STK_CODE, B.STK_DESC AS PREFIX_STK_DESC, A.PREFIX_CONV_STK_ID, C.STK_CODE AS PREFIX_CONV_STK_CODE, C.STK_DESC AS PREFIX_CONV_STK_DESC, A.USE_YN, A.CRT_USER_ID, D.USER_NAME AS CRT_USER, TO_CHAR(A.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') CRT_DT FROM LOG0205M A LEFT JOIN SYS0026M B ON A.PREFIX_STK_ID = B.STK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0026M C ON A.PREFIX_CONV_STK_ID = C.STK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M D ON A.CRT_USER_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREFIX_CONFIG_ID = #{prefixConfigId} ORDER BY A.PREFIX_CONFIG_ID DESC
